rect.style: stroke: rgb(121, 212, 248); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; paint-order: stroke markers; fill-opacity: 1; fill: url("#gradient-2"); stroke-width: 33.5717px;

circle.style: fill: url("#gradient-1"); stroke: url("#gradient-0"); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 16.7859px; visibility: hidden;
circle.title: Main circle

path.style: fill: none; fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(78, 193, 239); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 117.501px;
fill: none; fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(179, 233, 255); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 75.5364px;

text.style: font-family: "Baloo 2"; font-size: 81.9px; font-weight: 300; line-height: 191.825px; white-space: pre;
font-family: "Baloo 2"; font-size: 81.9px; font-weight: 600; line-height: 191.825px; white-space: pre;
